q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7' AND status = 2 AND end_time < '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks completed by the "Skilled Sewers" group before June 2024

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id, planned_number FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (17, 18);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the completed sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, pt.description, p.attributes FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (17, 18));
steps.description: Retrieve the product types and attributes for the products produced in these sewing tasks

response:

| Sewing Task ID | Product Type | Attributes       | Quantity |
|----------------|--------------|------------------|----------|
| 17             | Jacket       | Yellow, L size   | 175      |
| 18             | Jacket       | Brown, L size    | 200      |

The "Skilled Sewers" completed a total of 2 sewing tasks, producing jackets in different colors and sizes. Keep up the great work, Skilled Sewers! ğŸ§µâœ¨
